title: The Right People
itunes:title: The Right People
description:
Proverbs 13:20 says, “He who walks with wise men will become wise.” Make sure you’re hanging around the right people, the type that will inspire you to come up higher and be all that God has created you to be!

Learn how to make the necessary boundaries and changes necessary so that you can thrive in life. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
